item.title: Front
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[workforce_load_template path="templates/content-hero"] Try Segments CRM WordPress Theme for free by using demo account or by creating new one.

Features You Will Love

Main features which are making Segments standing out of the crowd and bringing absolutely new CRM features on the table.

Company Processes

Manage your colleagues information, create new estimates and invoices and download them as PDF. Everything on one place.

Easy Invoicing

Create brand new invoices or convert completed projects with tasks into invoice in one click.

CRM Management

Use powerful CRM functionality and collect all contact information and let your network grow by scheduling meetings in company.

Expenses Tracking

Easily log all company expenses on one place and see statistics how your business is doing.

Project Development

Each company has own projects. In Segments you can create new project, assign tasks, human resources and track progress.

Scheduling Meetings

Schedule new meetings to colleagues with your clients and follow on dashboard all upcoming events.

Boost your business and share important contact & project information between your colleagues.

All business contacts on one place. Never miss any meeting or loose company's contact. Purchase Theme

Professional Business Headquarters

In Segments you can manage all standard company workflows like collecting contacts, scheduling meeting, managing projects and so on.

Segments Best Features

  • TouchpointsNever miss a meeting
  • PeopleCollect contacts
  • TasksAssign to colleagues
  • InvoicesEasily create and export
  • ExpensesTrack your expenses
  • EstimatesFor potential clients
  • ProjectsArrange your work
  • Companiesmanage partners

Because Code Quality Matters

Everybody knows that design is important but for long term business you need to have reliable, flexible and stable codebase.

  • 01

    WordPress Actions & Filters

    Building new features upon existing codebase.

  • 02

    Annotations

    New way to mark actions & filters functions.

  • 03

    Advanced Documentation

    All important projects parts are well documented.

  • 04

    Class Autoloaded

    Don't mess with includes and let the system load the classes.

  • 05

    OOP Architecture

    We are using OOP principles for CRM development.

  • 06

    WordPress Linter

    Code is passing WordPress code standards.

  • 07

    Child Theme Support

    Important part for changing the functionality per project.

  • 08

    CMB2 Fields

    Beautiful library for creating new fields.

Do you want to change functionality and visual?

Check our documentation for more information to see how easy it is.

Documentation
